member.name: T:ApplicationMetrics.IMetricLogger
member.summary: Defines methods to record metric and instrumentation events for an application.

member.name: M:ApplicationMetrics.IMetricLogger.Increment(ApplicationMetrics.CountMetric)
member.summary: Records a single instance of the specified count event.

member.name: M:ApplicationMetrics.IMetricLogger.Add(ApplicationMetrics.AmountMetric,System.Int64)
member.summary: Records an instance of the specified amount metric event, and the associated amount.
member.param: The amount associated with the instance of the amount metric.

member.name: M:ApplicationMetrics.IMetricLogger.Set(ApplicationMetrics.StatusMetric,System.Int64)
member.summary: Records an instance of the specified status metric event, and the associated value.
member.param: The value associated with the instance of the status metric.

member.name: M:ApplicationMetrics.IMetricLogger.Begin(ApplicationMetrics.IntervalMetric)
member.summary: Records the starting of the specified interval metric event.
member.returns: A unique id for the starting of the interval metric, which should be subsequently passed to the or methods, when using the class in interleaved mode.

member.name: M:ApplicationMetrics.IMetricLogger.End(ApplicationMetrics.IntervalMetric)
member.summary: Records the completion of the specified interval metric event when using the class in non-interleaved mode.

member.name: M:ApplicationMetrics.IMetricLogger.End(System.Guid,ApplicationMetrics.IntervalMetric)
member.summary: Records the completion of the specified interval metric event when using the class in interleaved mode.
member.param: The id corresponding to the starting of the specified interval metric event (i.e. returned when the method was called).

member.name: M:ApplicationMetrics.IMetricLogger.CancelBegin(ApplicationMetrics.IntervalMetric)
member.summary: Cancels the starting of the specified interval metric event when using the class in non-interleaved mode (e.g. in the case that an exception occurs between the starting and completion of the event).
member.param: The interval metric that should be cancelled.

member.name: M:ApplicationMetrics.IMetricLogger.CancelBegin(System.Guid,ApplicationMetrics.IntervalMetric)
member.summary: Cancels the starting of the specified interval metric event when using the class in interleaved mode (e.g. in the case that an exception occurs between the starting and completion of the event).
member.param: The id corresponding to the starting of the specified interval metric event (i.e. returned when the method was called).
The interval metric that should be cancelled.
